messages.subject: Fw:  Doggy Wonderland
messages.msgSnippet: For all you doggy owners, here s today s giggle. Lynda
messages.messageBody:
For all you doggy owners, here's today's giggle.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----

> Walking In A Doggie Wonderland!
>
> Dogs tags ring, are you listening?
> In the lane, snow is glistening,
> It's yellow, not white,
> I've been there tonight,
> Marking up my winter wonderland!
>
> Smell that tree? That's my fragrance.
> It's a sign for wand'ring vagrants,
> "Avoid where I pee, it's MY property!
> Marked up as my winter wonderland!"
>
> In the meadow, Dad will build a snowman,
> Following the classical design.
> Then I'll lift my leg and let it go, man,
> So all the world will know it's mine, mine, mine!
>
> Straight from me to the fence post
> Flows my natural incense boast,
> "Stay off my turf, this small piece of earth,
> I mark it as my winter wonderland!"
